issue.message: Experimental annotation has `RUNTIME` retention, should use default (`CLASS`)
Experimental annotation has default (`RUNTIME`) retention, should use `BINARY`
This declaration is opt-in and its usage should be marked with `@sample.optin.ExperimentalJavaAnnotation` or `@OptIn(markerClass = sample.optin.ExperimentalJavaAnnotation.class)`
issue.errorLine1: static class ConcreteExperimentalInterface implements ExperimentalInterface { // unsafe
